code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import Http from"./http.api";var GetCountriesUrl="http://hamnavazi-api.azurewebsites.net/api/Instrument/Location/GetAllCountrys";var getAllCountries=function getAllCountries(){return Http.get(GetCountriesUrl).then(function(res){return res.data.result;}).catch(function(err){return;});};export var useAllCountries=function useAllCountries(){return useQuery("countries",getAllCountries,{retry:1,retryDelay:500,refetchOnWindowFocus:false});};
